item.title: Tips GO
item.description: GO注意事項 Ref: Nine quick tips for pathway enrichment analysis, 2022 PLOS computation biology, https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1010348 Tip 1: Before starting, clarify which analysis you would like to perform What analysis type Pathway enrichment analysis (PEA) does not give clues about the active or inhibited status of the pathways. More appropriately, PEA provides information about how genes help carry out pathways. overrepresentation analysis (ORA) focus of ORA methods is the gene set ORA outputs all pathways enriched in the query gene list as a whole, and mainly uses a nonranked list
